author: dwhedon
msg: * subversion/libsvn_repos/README : Removed as suggested by cmpilato.
The information in this file is out of date and it isn't actually
needed to understand how this library works.

author: sussman
msg: Fix faulty error-return logic in 'svn diff' (fixes a segfault).
